de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util

Class TextureHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.TextureHelper

  • public class TextureHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Consists of static methods useful when loading Textures

    • Method Detail

      • loadSingleTile

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion loadSingleTile(java.lang.String tex,
                                                         int x,
                                                         int y,
                                                         int width,
                                                         int height)
        Loads a single tile from an tileset Texture (that is flattened it if needed)
        Parameters:
        tex - The tileset texture (as an resource name)
        x - the x position of the tile (= the n-th tile from the left)
        y - the y position of the tile (= the n-th tile from the top)
        width - the width of a single tile
        height - the height of a single tile
        Returns:
        the specific tile at position [x|y]

        y - the y position of the tile (= the n-th tile from the top)

        height - the height of a single tile

      • load2DArray

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[][] load2DArray(java.lang.String tex,
                                                          int width,
                                                          int height,
                                                          int offsetX,
                                                          int offsetY,
                                                          int countX,
                                                          int countY)
        Loads a Tileset Texture into an two-dimensional array
        Parameters:
        tex - the tileset texture (as an resource name)
        width - the width of a single tile
        height - the height of a single tile
        offsetX - the X-offset of all tiles
        offsetY - the Y-offset of all tiles
        countX - the amount of tiles horizontally
        countY - the amount of tiles vertically
        Returns:
        an array with the distinct tiles

      • load2DArray

        Parameters:
        tex - the tileset texture
        width - the width of a single tile
        height - the height of a single tile
        offsetX - the X-offset of all tiles
        offsetY - the Y-offset of all tiles
        countX - the amount of tiles horizontally
        countY - the amount of tiles vertically
        Returns:
        an array with the distinct tiles
